statements: UPSERT INTO countries (id, name, capital) VALUES (1, 'USA', 'Washington') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'USA', capital = 'Washington';
UPSERT INTO countries (id, name, capital) VALUES (2, 'Canada', 'Ottawa') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'Canada', capital = 'Ottawa';
UPSERT INTO government_officials (id, name, position, country_id) VALUES (1, 'Joe Biden', 'President', 1) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'Joe Biden', position = 'President', country_id = 1;
UPSERT INTO government.ministries (id, name, minister) VALUES ('uuid1', 'Ministry of Finance', 'John Doe')
UPSERT INTO government.agencies (id, name, director) VALUES ('uuid2', 'Internal Affairs Agency', 'Jane Smith')
UPSERT INTO government.departments (id, name, head) VALUES ('uuid3', 'Department of Health', 'Alice Johnson')
UPSERT INTO government.employees (employee_id, name, department_id) VALUES (1, 'Employee 1', 1);
UPSERT INTO government.projects (project_id, name, department_id) VALUES (1, 'Project 1', 1);
